info.name: Instagram Night
info.description: Dark Instagram that also supports mobile view (the only worthwhile way of using Instagram on a PC)
info.additionalInfo:
Release: 
  Most things in both standard and mobile view should be covered.

Update 1:
- Minor update, some things weren't covered anymore
- Mobile View followers now dark
- Follow Icon on a profile should now be visible

Update 2: 
- Minor update, some things were inconsistently coloured
- Settings page improved
- Comments on mobile view improved
